nodes.text: Wing Commander was a military rank in the Grand Army of the Republic, Imperial, New Republic, and Yuuzhan Vong militaries.

Although the full rank appears to be "wing commander," a person holding this rank was generally referred to simply as "commander." In the Rebel Alliance, the rank in Starfighter Command was used interchangeably with colonel.

It is unclear in many instances whether an individual was a commander or wing commander. Wedge Antilles was referred to as a "wing commander" during the Thrawn Trilogy, but only as a "commander" in X-Wing: Isard's Revenge, which covers some of the same events, specifically the Battle of Bilbringi. Although it is conceivable that Antilles could have been promoted after the events of X-Wing: Solo Command, the X-Wing book series is consistent in reference to his rank of simply "commander" despite the in-universe time gap and previous continuity of The Last Command.[source?]
